description.value:
The true strength of the mind lies in the knowledge it contains, with each new observation contributing to the totality of its experiences. To grow your experiences-and with them, your power-you devote yourself to observing as much as possible, casting your senses through space and time with clairvoyance and precognition.

Granted Spells

  • 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike]{True Strike}
  • 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Augury]{Augury}
  • 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Organsight]{Organsight}
  • 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Clairvoyance]{Clairvoyance}
  • 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Prying Eye]{Prying Eye}
  • 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.True Seeing]{True Seeing}
  • 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.True Target]{True Target}
  • 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Unrelenting Observation]{Unrelenting Observation}
  • 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Foresight]{Foresight}

Standard Psi Cantrips

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Detect Magic]{Detect Magic}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Guidance]{Guidance}

  • deepest: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Foresee the Path]{Foresee the Path}
